Italian progressive/power/epic metal band Moon of Steel was formed in 1984. Based in Milan, their demo Uner Three Half Moons debuted in 1987. It was followed in November 1989 by their debut album Passions.

The group disbanded shortly thereafter, but in 1998, Adrenaline Records convinced them to get back together. They released the 4-track mini-CD Beyond The Edges in 1999 with new vocalist Sarah Ã¢â‚¬Å“J3Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Bonetti.
